name: Wilford - Deep Underground
description:
A top down action game that plays like games of the 1980s and 1990s.

Help Wilford collect as many riches as possible, while delving deeper and deeper underground. Balance the time you spend collecting valuables and finding the exit. Levels get harder and harder as you go. Get the best score you can and challenge your friends to do better.

Join our Discord if you have suggestions, constructive critisism or just want a chat: https://discord.gg/879SEbgVQq
